childnodes.sy: Honduras seems to come with a lot of travel warnings, but that didn't stop Macca and Brianna from travelling there and seeing it for themselves.
Macca and Brianna begin their adventure in Vancouver, Canada, before travelling from Mexico City all the way down through Central America to Panama City.
Guatemala is a bit of a favourite amongst backpackers with nothing but good times to be had, as Macca and Brianna found out for themselves.

Brianna and Macca head to Caye Caulker, Belize for a little island time. The pair go on a Raggamuffin Tour, sailing and snorkelling along the Caribbean coast, eating and drinking the local fare and soak in the laid back island vibes.
In this episode Macca and Brianna get a little taste of Oaxaca, a city that's famous for its food.
In this episode Macca and Brianna wander the streets of Mexico City, taking in all that it has to offer.
Macca Sherifi meets Brianna Wiens in Vancouver for the first time as A Brit and A Broad kick off the start of their adventure travelling through Central America.
